rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Use right_option + ;/' to cycle through running applications (like command+tab).
Use right_option + h/l to switch tabs in an application.
Use right_option + j/k to switch windows of the foreground application.
Use right_option + i/o to cycle through windows of any application in the current desktop space.
Map fn + number keys to their corresponding function keys
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
right_command+v does special paste without formatting
Change delete_or_backspace to fn if pressed with other keys and forward
Change tab to option/alt if pressed with other keys, to horizontal tab (\t) if pressed alone
